title: Reflective Thinking-Based Instructional Design for Biomedical Device Design Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental biomedical knowledge and comprehension of engineering design principles
context.additional_context: Learners must adapt to online learning environments that involve team project execution and the use of digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply reflective thinking patterns in the biomedical device design problem-solving process.
Learners can analyze core elements of design problems and propose improvement directions through collaboration with team members.
Learners enhance their ability to predict design errors in advance and derive alternatives based on reflective thinking during project execution.
Learners can use self-directed assessment tools to create reflection journals during the design problem-solving process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
